This will be a career exploration seminar for juniors, seniors and transfer students (max: 30
students) in the MCS major with weekly guest speakers, in consultation with the UC
Davis Internship and Career Center. This will entail weekly conversations with a wide variety of marine science professionals.


## Stories of Marine Scientists
